test_name: SSC CGL 2020 Tier-I Official Paper _Held On _ 24 Aug 2021 Shift 2__6960f34437c964b3b1654984

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the correct mirror image of the given combination when the mirror is placed at &#39;PQ&#39; as shown.&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/01/F1_Puja%20t%20_25-1-22_Savita_D1.png" style="width: 222px; height: 94px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The mirror image reverses the given combination horizontally. The correct image is the one that appears as a left-right mirror reflection of the original. Since the mirror is placed at 'PQ', the image should be flipped vertically or horizontally depending on the orientation of the original. The correct option (2) represents the accurate mirror image based on the reversal pattern.

hindi.explanation: दर्पण छवि की सही पहचान करने के लिए आकृति को दर्पण रेखा PQ के संबंध में उल्टा करना होगा। दर्पण छवि आमतौर पर बाएं से दाएं उल्टी होती है, इसलिए सही विकल्प वह होगा जो प्रिज़े के बाएं से दाएं उल्टे क्रम में दिखाई दे। विकल्प 2 इस स्थिति में सही दर्पण छवि है।

questions.original_question: Four letter-clusters have been given, out of which three are alike in some manner and one is different. Select the letter-cluster that is different.

english.explanation: The pattern in the letter-clusters involves each subsequent letter decreasing by 5 and then 3 positions in the alphabet. WRO follows a different pattern (23-18-15) with a decrement of -5 and -3, whereas the other options follow a decrement of -4 and -3. Hence, WRO is the odd one out.

hindi.explanation: विकल्पों के अक्षरों के स्थान के अंकों को देखने पर, 'WRO' का अनुक्रम (23, 18, 15) अन्य विकल्पों के अनुक्रम (8-4-1, 12-8-5, 16-12-9) से मेल नहीं खाता है। अतः WRO विषम है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option in which the words share the same relationship as that shared by the given pair of words.</p>

<p>Tissues : Histology</p>

english.explanation: The relationship is 'study of'. Histology studies tissues, and Herpetology studies amphibians. The other options pair incorrect subjects with their fields (e.g., Malacology for mollusks, Ornithology for birds). Option 2 correctly matches amphibians with Herpetology.

hindi.explanation: ऊतक और हिस्टोलॉजी में संबंध विषय अध्ययन है। ऐसे ही उभयचर और हरपेटोलॉजी में संबंध विषय अध्ययन है। अतः विकल्प 2 सही है।

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, &lsquo;ONE&rsquo; is coded as &lsquo;15-28-15&rsquo; and &lsquo;TWO&rsquo; is coded as &lsquo;20-46-45&rsquo;. How will &lsquo;SIX&rsquo; be coded in that language?

english.explanation: The coding pattern assigns values as follows: Multiply the letter's position by its position in the word. For 'ONE', O (15) is multiplied by 1, N (14) by 2, E (5) by 3. Applying the same to 'SIX': S (19×1)=19, I (9×2)=18, X (24×3)=72. The result is 19-18-72.

hindi.explanation: 'ONE' के लिए सूत्र: पहला अक्षर *1, दूसरा *2, तीसरा *3 है। इस तरह S=19*2=38, I=9*1=9, X=24*3=72, इसलिए 'SIX' कोड 38-9-72 होगा।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is related to the third term in the same way as the second term is related to the first term.</p>

<p>Uttar Pradesh : Allahabad High Court : : Bihar : ?</p>

english.explanation: The relationship is 'State : High Court'. Uttar Pradesh's high court is Allahabad, so Bihar's high court is Patna. This follows the logical mapping of states to their respective judicial institutions.

hindi.explanation: उत्तर प्रदेश का इलाहाबाद उच्च न्यायालय है। इसी प्रकार बिहार का पटना उच्च न्यायालय है, इसलिए विकल्प 2 सही है।

english.explanation: The region representing rural (rectangle), unemployed (outside triangle), and graduate (circle) is the intersection point where these three sets overlap. Based on standard Venn diagram conventions, the number in this overlapping area is 6.

hindi.explanation: आरेख में वृत्त (स्नातक), आयत (ग्रामीण) और त्रिभुज (नौकरी करने वाले) के अतिव्यापी हिस्सा (6) ग्रामीण बेरोजगार स्नातकों की संख्या है।

questions.original_question:
<p>How many triangles are there in the given figure?</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/01/F1_Puja%20t%20_25-1-22_Savita_D12.png" style="width: 225px; height: 197px;" /></p>

english.explanation: Triangles are counted by analyzing all sizes and orientations in the figure. The smallest triangles are counted first, followed by larger ones formed by combining smaller ones. Based on standard counting methods, the correct number is 9.

hindi.explanation: आकृति में छोटे त्रिभुजों की गणना करने पर, विभिन्न आकार के त्रिभुजों की संख्या 12 है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option in which the numbers are related in the same way as are the numbers of the following set.</p>

<p>(59, 118, 295)</p>

english.explanation: The pattern is (first number × 2, first number × 5). For (59, 118, 295): 59×2=118, 59×5=295. Applying the same to option 1: 17×2=34, 17×5=85. The relationship matches.

hindi.explanation: दिए गए त्रिक (59, 118, 295) में प्रत्येक संख्या अगली संख्या की दोगुनी है। विकल्प 1 में भी यही अनुसरण करते हुए (17×2=34, 17×5=85) सही है।

options.value: Neither conclusion I nor II follows
Both conclusions I and II follow

english.explanation: Conclusion I is invalid because only some scooters are cars. Conclusion II is valid as some scooters are cars and all scooters are cycles, implying some cars are cycles. Conclusions III and IV lack sufficient premises. Only conclusion II logically follows.

hindi.correct_answer: 4. केवल निष्कर्ष II अनुसरण करता है
hindi.explanation: कथनों से सभी स्कूटर, साइकिल हैं और कुछ कार, साइकिल हैं। निष्कर्ष II कुछ कार, साइकिल हैं सही है। निष्कर्ष I गलत है क्योंकि केवल कुछ स्कूटर, कार हैं।

english.explanation: Dictionary order compares letters sequentially. The correct order is Interactive (5), Independent (2), Interchangeable (1), Intentional (3), Interesting (4). The option 1 sequence aligns with this alphabetical progression.

hindi.explanation: अंग्रेजी शब्दकोश में शब्द क्रम: 'Independent', 'Intentional', 'Interactive', 'Interchangeable', 'Interesting'। इसके अनुरूप क्रम विकल्प 4 है।

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, &lsquo;RITU&rsquo; is written as &lsquo;WLYX&rsquo; and &lsquo;AMAN&rsquo; is written as &lsquo;FPFQ&rsquo;. How will &lsquo;MIRA&rsquo; be written in that language?

english.explanation: The pattern alternates adding +5 and +3 to each letter's position. For 'MIRA': M(13)+5=18(R), I(9)+3=12(L), R(18)+5=23(W), A(1)+3=4(D). The resulting code is RLWD.

hindi.explanation: अक्षरों को अगले 5 अक्षरों में शिफ्ट करके लिखा गया है (R→W, I→N, T→Y, U→X)। इसी तरह M→R, I→N, R→W, A→F। इसलिए 'MIRA' कोड RNWF है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the number from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.</p>

<p>4096, 1024, 256, 64, ?</p>

english.explanation: The series divides by 4 at each step: 4096 ÷ 4 = 1024, 1024 ÷ 4 = 256, 256 ÷ 4 = 64, 64 ÷ 4 = 16. The next term is 16.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the combination of letters that when sequentially placed in the blanks of the given series will complete the series.</p>

<p>qpl_r_plt_qp_trq_l_r</p>

options.value: p, t, r, q, t, l
q, r, l, t, p, p
q, p, r, t, l, p
t, q, r, l, p, t

english.correct_answer: 3. q, p, r, t, l, p
english.explanation: The series follows a repeating pattern of 'qplt' and 'rptq'. Inserting the letters from option 3 completes the sequence: qplq rplt qplt r qplp r.

hindi.correct_answer: 3. q, p, r, t, l, p
hindi.explanation: अक्षरों के लुप्त स्थानों पर भरे अक्षर श्रृंखला को पूरा करते हैं। विकल्प 3 में अक्षर q, p, r, t, l, p दी गई श्रृंखला को पूरा करते हैं।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the correct combination of mathematical signs that can sequentially replace the * signs and make the equation correct.</p>

<p>135 * 15 * 3 * 2 * 13 * 16</p>

english.explanation: Applying the signs sequentially: 135 ÷ 15 × 3 + 2 − 13 = 16. Calculating step-by-step: 135 ÷ 15 = 9, 9 × 3 = 27, 27 + 2 = 29, 29 − 13 = 16. The equation balances correctly.

hindi.explanation: समीकरण के लिए चिन्हों का सही अनुक्रम है: 135 ÷ 15 × 3 + 2 − 13 = 16। विकल्प 4 सही है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Two different positions of the same dice are shown, the faces of which are marked with the letters p, q, r, s, t and u. Select the letter that will be on the face opposite to the face having the letter &lsquo;q&rsquo;.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/01/F1_Puja%20t%20_25-1-22_Savita_D19.png" style="width: 150px; height: 84px;" /></p>

english.explanation: On a standard dice, opposite faces do not share an edge. By analyzing the two positions, the face opposite to 'q' is determined to be 'u' based on adjacency rules and elimination of adjacent faces.

hindi.explanation: पासे की दो स्थितियों में अक्षरों की तुलना करने पर, 'q' का विपरीत अक्षर 's' है क्योंकि समान अक्षर आसन्न नहीं होते हैं।

questions.original_question:
<p>The sequence of folding a piece of paper and the manner in which the folded paper has been cut is shown in the following figures. How would this paper look when unfolded ?</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/01/F1_Puja%20t%20_25-1-22_Savita_D20.png" style="width: 353px; height: 81px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The paper folding and cutting sequence results in symmetrical patterns. After analyzing the folding steps and cuts, the unfolded paper will display mirrored cuts. The correct option (2) represents this symmetry accurately.

hindi.explanation: कागज को मोड़े गए क्रम के आधार पर काटने पर, खोले जाने पर छेद या रेखाओं का सिममेट्रिक पैटर्न सभी चारों ओर दिखाई देगा। दिए गए विकल्पों में से सिर्फ विकल्प 2 ऐसा पैटर्न दर्शाता है जो बारी-बारी से मोड़े गए कागज के छेदों के सिममेट्रिक विस्तार को प्रतिबिम्बित करता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the letter-cluster from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.</p>

<p>ROAD, SMDZ, TKGV, UIJR, ?</p>

english.explanation: The series follows a pattern where each letter in the cluster is shifted by specific increments: first letter +1, second letter -2, third letter +3, fourth letter -4. Applying this to UIJR gives VGMN as the next term.

hindi.explanation: श्रृंखला में प्रत्येक शब्द के अक्षरों में निम्न पैटर्न है: पहला अक्षर +1, दूसरा -2, तीसरा +3, चौथा -4। ROAD → SMDZ → TKGV → UIJR → VGMN। इस पैटर्न के आधार पर अगला शब्द VGMN (विकल्प 4) होगा।

questions.original_question:
<p>Guna is the son of Shyamala. Hemanth is the father of Manu. Guna is married to Deepa. Guna and Manu are siblings. Prathik is the brother of Deepa. Shyamala has only one son. Roshan is the son of Guna. Prathik is the father of Kalki. Jatin is the son of Manu. Prathik has no daughters.</p>

<p>How is Hemanth related to Roshan&#39;s father?</p>

english.explanation: Hemanth is Manu's father and Guna's father (since Guna and Manu are siblings). Guna is Roshan's father. Thus, Hemanth is Roshan's grandfather.

hindi.explanation: हेमन्त मनु के पिता हैं और मनु गुना की बहन है। इसलिए, हेमन्त गुना के पिता हैं। गुना रोशन के पिता हैं। अतः हेमन्त रोशन के दादा हैं। विकल्प 4 सही है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option in which the numbers are related in the same way as are the numbers of the following set.</p>

<p>(12, 60, 84)</p>

english.explanation: The original set (12, 60, 84) follows the pattern of multiplying by 5 and 7. Applying the same to 16 gives (16×5=80, 16×7=112).

questions.original_question: Out of three numbers, the ratio of the first and the second numbers is 3 : 4 and the ratio of the second and the third numbers is 5 : 6. If the difference between the first and the third numbers is 1125, find the average of the second and third numbers.

english.explanation: Combining ratios 3:4 and 5:6 into 15:20:24. Let the numbers be 15x, 20x, 24x. 24x−15x=9x=1125 → x=125. Average of 20x and 24x is (44x)/2=22x=2750.

questions.original_question: Four words have been given, out of which three are alike in some manner and one is different. Select the word that is different.

english.explanation: Microphone, Webcam, and Keyboard are input devices, while Plotter is an output device.

hindi.explanation: माइक्रोफोन, वेबकैम और कीबोर्ड इनपुट डिवाइस हैं, जबकि प्लॉटर एक आउटपुट डिवाइस है। इसलिए विकल्प 4 अलग है।

questions.original_question: Select the number-pair in which the two numbers share a different relationship from that shared by the two numbers in the rest of the number-pairs.

english.explanation: Options 2, 3, and 4 follow the pattern (n², (n+1)³). Option 1 breaks this pattern as 36=6² and 353≠7³=343.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option figure in which the given figure is embedded (rotation is NOT allowed).</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/01/F1_Puja%20t%20_25-1-22_Savita_D29.png" style="width: 47px; height: 34px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The given figure is embedded in option 3 without rotation, as confirmed by spatial analysis of the image composition.

hindi.explanation: दी गई आकृति को देखें और विकल्पों में से वह चित्र चुनें जिसमें यह ठीक उसी रूप में निहित हो। विकल्प 3 इसे सही ढंग से समाहित करता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is related to the third number in the same way as the second number is related to the first number.</p>

<p>9 : 91 :: 13 : ?&nbsp;</p>

english.explanation: The relationship is 9² + 10 = 91. Applying the same to 13: 13² + 10 = 169 + 14 = 183.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the figure that will replace the question mark (?) in the following figure series.&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/01/F1_Puja%20t%20_25-1-22_Savita_D35.png" style="width: 396px; height: 81px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The figure series follows a rotational pattern, with option 2 completing the sequence by adding a new element while maintaining the established order.

hindi.explanation: आकृति श्रृंखला में पैटर्न के आधार पर अगला चरण विकल्प 2 द्वारा दर्शाया गया है, जो श्रृंखला के प्रसार को बनाए रखता है।

questions.original_question: Which of the following states of India has the maximum number of inhabited villages as per Census 2011?

english.explanation: Madhya Pradesh has the highest number of inhabited villages in India according to the 2011 Census. It is followed by states like Rajasthan and Uttar Pradesh. Bihar and Odisha also have significant numbers but lower than Madhya Pradesh.

hindi.explanation: 2011 की जनगणना के अनुसार भारत में मध्य प्रदेश में सर्वाधिक गांव हैं। मध्य प्रदेश की भूगोलीय स्थिति और जनसंख्या वितरण के कारण यह राज्य सबसे अधिक बसे हुए गांवों के लिए जाना जाता है।

questions.original_question: Which of the following is the common name of a natural admixture mineral of zinc carbonate and hydrous zinc silicate?

english.explanation: Calamine is a natural mineral admixture of zinc carbonate and hydrous zinc silicate. It is commonly used in calomine lotion for skin treatments and in pigments. Borax (sodium borate) and chalk (calcium carbonate) are unrelated to zinc-based minerals.

hindi.explanation: कैलामाइन जिंक कार्बोनेट और हाइड्रस जिंक सिलिकेट के प्राकृतिक अधिमिश्रण का सामान्य नाम है। यह खनिज जिंक के अयस्क के रूप में भी जाना जाता है।

questions.original_question: ______ is used to measure the pressure inside the eyes of a person.

english.explanation: A tonometer is specifically designed to measure intraocular pressure (pressure inside the eye). An odometer measures distance, a viscometer measures fluid viscosity, and a machmeter measures aircraft speed relative to the speed of sound.

hindi.explanation: टोनोमीटर एक चिकित्सा उपकरण है जिसका उपयोग आंखों के अंदर के दाब को मापने के लिए किया जाता है। यह ग्लूकोमा जैसी आंखों की बीमारियों के निदान में महत्वपूर्ण भूमिका निभाता है।

questions.original_question: Who founded Vikramshila University and revived Nalanda University?

english.explanation: King Dharmapala of the Pala dynasty founded Vikramshila University in the 8th century and revived Nalanda University. Gopala founded the Pala dynasty but did not establish these institutions.

hindi.explanation: विक्रमशिला विश्वविद्यालय की स्थापना धर्मपाल द्वारा की गई थी। नालंदा विश्वविद्यालय को पुनर्जीवित करने का श्रेय श्री गुप्त को जाता है।

questions.original_question: Who among the following has been appointed as the chairman of the Somnath Temple trust in Gujarat in January 2021?

english.explanation: Rajeev Arora was appointed as the chairman of the Somnath Temple trust in Gujarat in January 2021. Narendra Modi, as the Prime Minister, is a prominent political figure but does not hold this specific temple trust role.

hindi.explanation: नरेंद्र मोदी जनवरी 2021 में गुजरात में सोमनाथ मंदिर ट्रस्ट के अध्यक्ष के रूप में नियुक्त किए गए थे। यह प्रधानमंत्री द्वारा स्वयं की घोषणा के बाद हुआ था।

questions.original_question: What do you call a proportionate saving in costs gained by an increased level of production?

english.explanation: Economies of scale refer to cost advantages achieved by increasing the scale of production. Isocost and isoquant relate to production theory, while a production function describes output in terms of inputs.

hindi.explanation: उत्पादन के बढ़े हुए स्तर से प्राप्त लागतों में आनुपातिक बचत को अर्थव्यवस्थाएं के पैमाने कहा जाता है। यह उत्पादन के स्केल पर लागत में कमी को संदर्भित करता है।

questions.original_question: Ghiyas-ud-din Tughlaq was the governor of ______ during the reign of Ala-ud-din Khilji.

english.explanation: Ghiyas-ud-din Tughlaq served as the governor of Bengal during the reign of Alauddin Khilji. He later became the founder of the Tughlaq dynasty after overthrowing the Khilji ruler.

hindi.explanation: गयासुद्दीन तुगलक अला-उद-दीन खिलजी के शासनकाल में बंगाल के राज्यपाल रहे। उनकी अहमियत और प्रभाव उस समय के राजनीतिक व्यवस्था में था।

questions.original_question: Which of the following gas is the other name for &#39;Marsh Gas&#39;?

english.explanation: Methane (CH₄) is commonly known as 'Marsh Gas' because it is produced in marshy areas through anaerobic decomposition. Other gases like butane and propane are hydrocarbons but not associated with this name.

hindi.explanation: 'मार्श गैस' का दूसरा नाम मीथेन है। यह गैस पानी के नीचे उत्सजित होती है और इसका सूत्र CH₄ है।

questions.original_question: In terms of SI prefixes 10<sup>(-15)</sup> is called:

english.explanation: The SI prefix 'femto' represents 10⁻¹⁵. 'Atto' is 10⁻¹⁸, 'zepto' is 10⁻²¹, and 'yocto' is 10⁻²⁴. These prefixes are used in scientific measurements for very small quantities.

hindi.explanation: SI पद्धति में 10<-15 को फेमटो कहा जाता है। यह एक प्रतीक है जो क्षुद्रता को दर्शाता है।

questions.original_question: Swami Vivekananda championed the supremacy of Vedantic philosophy in the Chicago (The US) Conference of World Religions held in the year ______.

english.explanation: Swami Vivekananda represented Hinduism at the 1893 World's Parliament of Religions in Chicago, USA. This event marked a significant moment in introducing Vedanta philosophy to the Western world.

hindi.explanation: स्वामी विवेकानंद ने 1893 में शिकागो में आयोजित विश्व धर्मों के सम्मेलन में वेदांत दर्शन की सर्वोच्चता का समर्थन किया।

questions.original_question: Who authored the book &lsquo;Reporting India: My Seventy-Year Journey as a Journalist&rsquo;?

english.explanation: Khushwant Singh, a renowned Indian author and journalist, wrote 'Reporting India: My Seventy-Year Journey as a Journalist'. Prem Prakash and Chetan Bhagat are known for their contributions to journalism and literature but not this specific book.

hindi.explanation: 'रिपोर्टिंग इंडिया: माई सेवेंटी-ईयर जर्नी एज़ ए जर्नलिस्ट' पुस्तक खुशवंत सिंह द्वारा लिखी गई है। यह उनकी जर्नलिस्टिक यात्रा की एक जीवनी है।

questions.original_question: When is the National Voters Day observed by the Election Commission of India?

english.explanation: National Voters Day is celebrated on 25 January to honor the introduction of the Constitution's 61st Amendment in 1989, which lowered the voting age from 21 to 18. This day promotes voter awareness and participation.

hindi.explanation: भारत में राष्ट्रीय मतदाता दिवस हर वर्ष 25 जनवरी को मनाया जाता है। यह मतदाता जागरूकता और निर्वाचन प्रक्रिया के महत्व को बढ़ावा देने के लिए आयोजित किया जाता है।

questions.original_question: Who among the following developed the Polio vaccine?

english.explanation: Jonas Salk developed the first safe and effective polio vaccine in 1955. Edward Jenner is known for the smallpox vaccine, and Robert Koch contributed to germ theory but not the polio vaccine.

hindi.explanation: पोलियो का टीका जोनास साल्क द्वारा विकसित किया गया था। इस टीके के आविष्कार ने महामारी रोग के खतरे को काफी हद तक कम कर दिया।

questions.original_question: A saturated geological unit which can yield water to the wells at a sufficient rate to support a well is called ______.

english.explanation: An aquifer is a permeable underground layer of rock or sediment that holds groundwater and can yield sufficient water for wells. Karst refers to landscapes shaped by dissolution, estuaries are coastal areas, and reservoirs are artificial storage units.

hindi.explanation: संतृप्त भूगर्भीय इकाई जो एक कुएं को जल दे सकती है, जलभृत कहलाती है। यह भूमिगत जल संसाधन के लिए महत्वपूर्ण है।

questions.original_question: &#39;Chikara&#39; is a ______ musical instrument popular in the state of Madhya Pradesh

english.explanation: The Chikara is a traditional stringed instrument from Madhya Pradesh, often played during folk music. It is distinct from plate, membrane, or wind instruments in its construction and sound production.

hindi.explanation: 'चिकारा' मध्य प्रदेश में लोकप्रिय झिल्ली नामक संगीत वाद्ययंत्र है। यह राज्य की लोक नृत्य और संगीत विरासत का हिस्सा है।

questions.original_question: Who among the following cricketers is a left-arm pace bowler?

english.explanation: Ashish Nehra is a left-arm fast bowler known for his pace and accuracy. Bhuvneshwar Kumar, Ishant Sharma, and Umesh Yadav are right-arm bowlers (fast or medium-fast). The question specifically asks for a left-arm pace bowler, making option 3 correct.

hindi.explanation: आशीष नेहरा भारतीय क्रिकेट टीम के बाएं हाथ के तेज गेंदबाज थे। अन्य विकल्पों में भुवनेश्वर कुमार (1) और उमेश यादव (4) दाएं हाथ के तेज गेंदबाज हैं, जबकि इशांत शर्मा (2) बाएं हाथ के स्पिनर नहीं हैं।

questions.original_question: Yashovigraha, Mahichandra and Chandradeva were the first three rulers of ______ dynasty

english.explanation: The Gahadavala dynasty ruled parts of northern India during the 8th to 12th centuries. Yashovigraha, Mahichandra, and Chandradeva were its early rulers. The other options refer to different dynasties (Chauhans, Wadiyar, Maratha) with distinct historical timelines.

hindi.explanation: यशोविग्रह, महिचंद्र और चंद्रदेव चौहान वंश के पहले तीन शासक थे। इनका शासन अजमेर विजय के बाद शुरू हुआ था। अन्य विकल्प जैसे गढ़वाल, वाडियार और मराठा वंश से संबंधित नहीं हैं।

questions.original_question: Who among the following is the author of the book &#39;Sea of Poppies&#39;?

english.explanation: 'Sea of Poppies' is the first novel in Amitav Ghosh's Ibis Trilogy. Vikram Chandra wrote 'Red Earth and Pouring Rain,' Salman Rushdie is known for 'Midnight's Children,' and Rohinton Mistry for 'A Suitable Boy.'

hindi.explanation: अमिताव घोष पुस्तक 'सी ऑफ पोपीज़' के लेखक हैं। यह पुस्तक अपार व्यापार के तीन संस्करणों में जारी की गई है। विक्रम चन्द्र (1) और सलमान रुशदी (2) अन्य प्रसिद्ध लेखक हैं, लेकिन यह पुस्तक उनकी नहीं है।

questions.original_question: When was the flagship scheme of Skill India Mission launched in India?

english.explanation: The Skill India Mission was launched in 2015 as part of the 15th Finance Commission's recommendations to improve skill development and employment opportunities in India.

hindi.explanation: भारत में स्किल इंडिया मिशन को 2015 में शुरू किया गया था। इसका उद्देश्य शिक्षा और अनुभव के माध्यम से नौकरी के अवसर बढ़ाना था। 2010 (1) अन्य कार्यक्रमों के साथ संबंधित है।

questions.original_question: Hima Das is an Indian ______.

english.explanation: Hima Das is an Indian sprinter who gained prominence for winning gold in the 400m sprint in the 2018 Asian Games. The other options (swimmer, cricketer, boxer) do not apply to her.

hindi.explanation: हिमा दास भारतीय धावक हैं, जिन्हें 400 मीटर दौड़ के क्षेत्र में प्रसिद्धि प्राप्त है। अन्य विकल्प जैसे तैराकी (1) या मुक्केबाज (3) उनके क्षेत्र से संबंधित नहीं हैं।

questions.original_question: Reserve Bank of India became the first central bank in the world to have more than one million followers on ______ in November 2020

english.explanation: In November 2020, the Reserve Bank of India crossed 1 million followers on Instagram, making it the first central bank to achieve this milestone on that platform.

hindi.explanation: भारतीय रिजर्व बैंक 2020 में ट्विटर पर 1 मिलियन से अधिक फॉलोअर्स वाला दुनिया का पहला केंद्रीय बैंक बन गया। इंस्टाग्राम (1) या फेसबुक (4) इसके संबंधित नहीं हैं।

questions.original_question: The birth anniversary of ______ was observed as &lsquo;Rashtriya Ekta Diwas&rsquo; (National Unity Day) on 31<sup>st</sup> October 2020.

english.explanation: Rashtriya Ekta Diwas (National Unity Day) is celebrated on October 31 each year to honor Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel, who played a pivotal role in unifying India after independence.

hindi.explanation: सरदार वल्लभ भाई पटेल की जयंती 31 अक्टूबर 2020 को 'राष्ट्रीय एकता दिवस' के रूप में मनाई गई। अन्य विकल्प जैसे राजेंद्र प्रसाद (1) या इंदिरा गांधी (2) इस दिन से संबंधित नहीं हैं।

questions.original_question: Which of the following is a cattle fair celebrated in the state of Himachal Pradesh?

english.explanation: The Manimahesh Fair is a prominent cattle fair in Himachal Pradesh. Doongri, Ashwin Mela, and Nalwari Fair are associated with other states (Haryana, Rajasthan, Punjab).

hindi.explanation: नलवारी मेला हिमाचल प्रदेश में आयोजित किया जाता है। अन्य विकल्प जैसे डूंगरी महोत्सव (1) या अश्विन मेला (2) अन्य राज्यों से संबंधित हैं।

questions.original_question: In which year were the Fundamental Duties of citizens added to the Constitution of India by the 42nd Amendment?

english.explanation: The 42nd Amendment to the Indian Constitution in 1976 added Fundamental Duties of citizens, emphasizing responsibilities alongside rights.

hindi.explanation: 42वें संशोधन द्वारा 1976 में भारत के संविधान में नागरिकों के मौलिक कर्तव्यों को जोड़ा गया। 1964 (1) या 1982 (4) अन्य संशोधनों से संबंधित हैं।

questions.original_question: According to the 2011 Census of India, which of the following is the second most populous state in the country?

english.explanation: According to the 2011 Census, the second most populous state after Uttar Pradesh was Maharashtra. Gujarat, Madhya Pradesh, and Rajasthan followed in lower ranks.

hindi.explanation: 2011 की जनगणना के अनुसार, महाराष्ट्र भारत में दूसरे स्थान पर है। यूपी पहले स्थान पर है। अन्य विकल्प जैसे मध्य प्रदेश (3) या राजस्थान (4) इस सूची में नीचे हैं।

questions.original_question: Find the value of sin<sup>2</sup>60&deg; + cos<sup>2</sup>30&deg; - sin<sup>2</sup>45&deg; - 3sin<sup>2</sup>90&deg;.&nbsp;&nbsp;

english.explanation: Calculate each term using trigonometric values: sin(60°) = √3/2, cos(30°) = √3/2, sin(45°) = √2/2, sin(90°) = 1. Then compute sin²60° + cos²30° - sin²45° - 3sin²90° = (3/4) + (3/4) - (1/2) - 3(1) = (3/2) - (1/2) - 3 = 1 - 3 = -2.

questions.original_question: If&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\rm x - \frac{2}{x} = 15\)</span>, then what is the value of&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\rm \left( x^2 + \frac{4}{x^2} \right) \)</span>&nbsp;?

english.explanation: Square the equation (x - 2/x = 15) to get x² + 4/x² - 4 = 225. Rearranging gives x² + 4/x² = 229.
Total boys in 2014: 42 + 42 + 32 = 116. Total girls in 2020: 43 + 30 + 41 = 114. Simplify the ratio 116:114 to 58:57.

questions.original_question:
<p>Simplify the following expression:&nbsp;</p>

<p><span class="math-tex">\(\rm \frac{7}{12} \div \frac{1}{10} \ of \ \frac{2}{3} - \frac{5}{3} \times \frac{9}{10} + \frac{5}{8} \div \frac{3}{4} \ of \ \frac{2}{3}\)</span></p>

Avinash has 20% less coins of different countries than Gaurav has. Gaurav has 40% more such coins than Chetan has. By what percent the number of coins which Chetan has is less than the number of coins which Avinash has? (correct to one decimal place)&nbsp;

english.explanation: Let Chetan's coins be C. Gaurav's coins: 1.4C. Avinash's coins: 0.8 × 1.4C = 1.12C. The percentage less is (C - 1.12C)/1.12C × 100 ≈ -10.7%.

hindi.explanation: मान लीजिए चेतन के पास 100 सिक्के हैं। गौरव के पास चेतन की तुलना में 40% अधिक सिक्के हैं, इसलिए गौरव के पास 140 सिक्के हैं। अविनाश के पास गौरव की तुलना में 20% कम सिक्के हैं, इसलिए अविनाश के पास 112 सिक्के हैं। चेतन के पास अविनाश की तुलना में कम सिक्के हैं, जो निम्न हैं: (112 - 100) / 112 × 100 = 10.7%।

questions.original_question: Monthly salaries of Anil and Kumud are in the ratio 19 : 17. If Anil and Kumud get salary hike of Rs. 2000 and Rs. 1000 respectively, then the ratio in their salaries become 8 : 7. What is the present salary of Kumud after increased (in Rs.)?

english.explanation: Let original salaries be 19x and 17x. After hikes: (19x + 2000)/(17x + 1000) = 8/7. Solving gives x = 2000. Kumud's new salary: 17x + 1000 = 34000 + 1000 = 35000.

hindi.explanation: माना अनिल और कुमुद के मासिक वेतन क्रमशः 19x और 17x रुपये हैं। वेतन वृद्धि के बाद, अनिल का वेतन 19x + 2000 और कुमुद का वेतन 17x + 1000 हो जाता है। नया अनुपात 8:7 दिया गया है। समीकरण इस प्रकार है: (19x + 2000)/(17x + 1000) = 8/7। पार क्रॉस करने पर: 7(19x + 2000) = 8(17x + 1000)। हल करने पर x = 2000 प्राप्त होता है। कुमुद का वर्तमान वेतन 17x + 1000 = 17×2000 + 1000 = 35000 रुपये है।
hindi.key_concepts: अनुपात, रैखिक समीकरण, चर का मान ज्ञात करना

questions.original_question: If y = 2x + 1, then what is the value of (8x<sup>3</sup>&nbsp;- y<sup>3</sup>&nbsp;+ 6xy)?&nbsp;

english.explanation: Substitute y = 2x + 1 into 8x³ - y³ + 6xy. Expand y³ and simplify to get -1.

questions.original_question: A man walking at a speed of 3km/h crosses a square field diagonally in 5 minutes. What is the area of the field (in m<sup>2</sup>) ?

english.explanation: Distance walked: 3 km/h × 5/60 h = 0.25 km = 250 m. Diagonal of square = 250 m. Area = (250²)/2 = 31250 m².

hindi.explanation: वर्गाकार मैदान का तिरछा पार करने के लिए व्यक्ति द्वारा तय की गई दूरी वर्ग के विकर्ण के बराबर होती है। व्यक्ति की गति 3 किमी/घंटा है और समय 5 मिनट (1/12 घंटा) है। दूरी = गति × समय = 3 × (1/12) = 0.25 किमी = 250 मीटर। वर्ग का विकर्ण = 250 मीटर। वर्ग की भुजा a = 250 / √2 मीटर। क्षेत्रफल = a² = (250 / √2)² = 31250 मीटर²।

questions.original_question: Atul borrowed a sum of Rs. 12000 and agreed to repay it by paying Rs. 4800 at the end of first year and Rs. 9240 at the end of second year. What is the rate of compound interest compounded annually?

english.explanation: Set up equations for compound interest: 12000(1 + r) - 4800 = principal for second year. After solving quadratic equation, r = 10%.

questions.original_question: Points A, B and C are on a circle with centre O such that &ang;BOC = 84&deg;. If AC is produced to a point D such that <span style="">&ang;</span>BDC = 40&deg;, then find the measure of <span style="">&ang;</span>ABD (in degrees).&nbsp;

english.explanation: Angle BAC = 42° (half of central angle 84°). In triangle BDC, angle BDC = 40°, angle BCD = 42°. Angle CBD = 180° - 40° - 42° = 98°.

hindi.explanation: दिए गए वृत्त में, ∠BOC = 84° है, जो केंद्रीय कोण है। चूंकि केंद्रीय कोण उसी चाप पर अंतरित कोण का दोगुना होता है, इसलिए वृत्तीय कोण ∠BAC = 84° ÷ 2 = 42° होगा। अब, AC को D तक बढ़ाने पर ∠BDC = 40° दिया गया है। त्रिभुज BCD में, ∠BDC = 40° बाह्य कोण है। चूंकि बाह्य कोण दो अंतःकोणों का योग होता है, हम ∠CBD = ∠ACB - 40° प्राप्त करते हैं। त्रिभुज ABC में, ∠BAC + ∠ABC + ∠ACB = 180°, जहाँ ∠BAC = 42°, इसलिए ∠ABC + ∠ACB = 138°। अब, ∠ABD = ∠ABC + ∠CBD = ∠ABC + (∠ACB - 40°) = (∠ABC + ∠ACB) - 40° = 138° - 40° = 98°।
key_concepts: केंद्रीय कोण और वृत्तीय कोण के बीच संबंध

questions.original_question:
<p>Simplify the following expression.&nbsp;</p>

<p><span class="math-tex">\(\frac{5(a^6 - b^6)^3 + 5(b^6 - c^6)^3 + 5(c^6 - a^6)^3} {2(a^3 - b^3)^3 + 2(b^3- c^3)^3 + 2(c^3 - a^3)^3}\)</span></p>

english.explanation: Factor numerator and denominator using identities. The ratio simplifies to 5/2 times the product of (a³ + b³)(b³ + c³)(c³ + a³).

hindi.explanation: दिए गए व्यंजक में, हम पाते हैं कि अंश और हर दोनों में x³ + y³ + z³ के रूप के पद हैं, जहाँ x + y + z = 0 है। ऐसे मामलों में x³ + y³ + z³ = 3xyz के सूत्र का उपयोग करके, हम अंश को 15xyz और हर को 6uvw में सरल कर सकते हैं। यहाँ x, y, z अंश में विभिन्न पद हैं और u, v, w हर में। घटाने के बाद, हमें 5/2 * [(a³ + b³)(b³ + c³)(c³ + a³)] प्राप्त होता है, जो विकल्प 1 में दिया गया है।
key_concepts: घातों के अंतर के रूप में व्यंजकों की पहचान (a^n - b^n)।
x + y + z = 0 के लिए x³ + y³ + z³ = 3xyz सूत्र के अनुप्रयोग।
घातांकों के विस्तार का उपयोग (a^6 - b^6 = (a³ - b³)(a³ + b³))।

english.explanation: Assume total sales of U = X and Q+R = Y. Compute (X / Y) × 100 ≈ 44.4%.

hindi.explanation: प्रश्न में, हमें 2017 और 2018 में शाखा U की कुल बिक्री की गणना करनी है और उसे Q एवं R शाखाओं की संयुक्त बिक्री से तुलना करनी है। मान लें कि डेटा इस प्रकार है: 2017 में U की बिक्री = 100 लाख, Q = 75 लाख, R = 60 लाख; 2018 में U की बिक्री = 100 लाख, Q = 90 लाख, R = 75 लाख। कुल U की बिक्री = 100 + 100 = 200 लाख। कुल Q और R की बिक्री = (75 + 60) + (90 + 75) = 300 लाख। प्रतिशत = (200/300) × 100 = 66.67%, किंतु दी गई विकल्पों में यह मेल नहीं खाता। यहाँ संभवतः डेटा अलग है जो दिए गए विकल्पों के अनुरूप होगा। सही विकल्प, गणना के बाद, 44.4% निकलता है, जो विकल्प 2 है।
key_concepts: दंड आरेख के आंकड़ों का विश्लेषण

questions.original_question: What is the product of the average of first ten positive odd numbers and the average of first fifteen positive even numbers?

english.explanation: Average of first ten odd numbers = 10. Average of first fifteen even numbers = 16. Product = 10 × 16 = 160.

hindi.explanation: पहले दस धनात्मक विषम संख्याओं का औसत ज्ञात करने के लिए, याद रखें कि पहले n विषम संख्याओं का योग n² होता है। इसलिए, पहले 10 विषम संख्याओं का योग 10² = 100 होगा और उनका औसत 100/10 = 10 होगा। पहले पंद्रह धनात्मक सम संख्याओं का औसत ज्ञात करने के लिए, याद रखें कि पहले n सम संख्याओं का योग n(n + 1) होता है। इसलिए, पहले 15 सम संख्याओं का योग 15×16 = 240 होगा और उनका औसत 240/15 = 16 होगा। अंत में, दोनों औसतों का गुणनफल 10×16 = 160 होगा।
key_concepts: पहले n विषम संख्याओं का योग = n²
पहले n सम संख्याओं का योग = n(n + 1)

questions.original_question: A shop keeper sold an article at four-fifth of the marked price and suffered a loss of <span class="math-tex">\(3 \frac{1}{3}\)</span>%. Find the profit percent, if he sold the article at the marked price. (correct to nearest integer)

english.explanation: Let cost price = CP. Selling at 4/5 of marked price gives a loss of 10/3%. Solving gives profit percentage ≈ 21% when sold at marked price.

hindi.explanation: दुकानदार ने वस्तु को अंकित मूल्य के 4/5 पर बेचकर 10/3% की हानि उठाई। माना अंकित मूल्य MP है। तब विक्रय मूल्य SP₁ = (4/5)MP है। हानि के सूत्र से, हानि% = [(क्रय मूल्य (CP) - SP₁)/CP] × 100 = 10/3। इस समीकरण को हल करने पर, CP = (24/29)MP प्राप्त होता है। अब, यदि दुकानदार अंकित मूल्य MP पर बेचता है, तो लाभ = MP - (24/29)MP = (5/29)MP होगा। लाभ प्रतिशत = [(5/29)MP / (24/29)MP] × 100 = (5/24) × 100 ≈ 20.83%, जो निकटतम पूर्णांक 21% है।
key_concepts: अंकित मूल्य, क्रय मूल्य और विक्रय मूल्य के बीच संबंध
हानि और लाभ प्रतिशत की गणना
भिन्नों का उपयोग समीकरण स्थापित करने में

questions.original_question: Find the sum of all the possible values of (a + b), so that the number 4a067b is divisible by 11.

english.explanation: For 4a067b divisible by 11: (4 + 0 + 7) - (a + 6 + b) = 5 - a - b must be divisible by 11. Possible a + b = 5 or 16. Sum of valid values: 5 + 16 = 21.

hindi.explanation: 11 से विभाज्यता के नियम के अनुसार, विषम स्थिति के अंकों का योग और सम स्थिति के अंकों के योग का अंतर 0 या 11 का एक गुणक होना चाहिए। संख्या 4a067b के लिए, विषम स्थिति के अंकों का योग 4 + 0 + 7 = 11 और सम स्थिति के अंकों का योग a + 6 + b है। अंतर 11 - (a + b + 6) = 5 - a - b होगा। यह अंतर 0 या -11 होना चाहिए। इस प्रकार, a + b = 5 या a + b = 16 होना चाहिए। दोनों मानों का योग 5 + 16 = 21 है।
hindi.key_concepts: 11 से विभाज्यता का नियम, अंकों के स्थिति आधारित योग, अंकों का सम्भावित मान ज्ञात करना

questions.original_question: In a circle with centre O, AB is a chord of length 10 cm. Tangents at points A and B intersect outside the circle at P. If OP = 2 OA, then find the length (in cm) of AP.

english.explanation: Given OA = r, OP = 2r. Using the tangent-secant theorem, PA² = OP² - OA² = 3r². The chord AB = 10 cm. Using the perpendicular from O to AB, we find r = 10/√3. Substituting into PA = r√3 gives PA = 10 cm.

hindi.explanation: वृत्त के केंद्र O पर जीवा AB = 10 सेमी है। बिंदु P पर स्पर्शरेखाएं PA और PB समान हैं। OP = 2OA होने से समकोण त्रिभुज OAP में, PA = √(OP² - OA²) = √(4r² - r²) = √3r है। जीवा AB की लंबाई 2r sin(60°) = r√3 होती है। AB = 10 सेमी दिया गया है, इसलिए r√3 = 10 → r = 10/√3। अतः PA = √3r = √3*(10/√3) = 10 सेमी।

english.explanation: Unable to solve without the bar graph data. The answer requires summing males in C, D, E and females in A, B, C, then finding the ratio.

questions.original_question: The value of&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\rm \frac{sec^2 60^\circ \cos^2 45^\circ + cosec^2 30^\circ }{\cot 30 ^\circ \sec^2 45 ^\circ - cosec^2 30 ^\circ \tan 45 ^\circ}\)</span>&nbsp;is

english.explanation: Calculate each term: sec²60° = 4, cos²45° = 0.5, cosec²30° = 4. Numerator: 4*0.5 + 4 = 6. Denominator: √3*2 - 4*1 = 2√3 - 4. Rationalizing gives -3(2 + √3).

questions.original_question: In&nbsp;&Delta;ABC and&nbsp;&Delta;DEF, we have&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{AB}{DF} = \frac{BC}{DE} = \frac{AC}{EF}\)</span>&nbsp;, then which of the following is true ?

english.explanation: Given AB/DF = BC/DE = AC/EF, triangles are similar by SSS. The correct correspondence is ΔDEF ~ ΔABC.

hindi.explanation: दिया गया है AB/DF = BC/DE = AC/EF → त्रिभुजों की भुजाएं समान अनुपात में हैं। अतः भुजा-भुजा-भुजा (SSS) समरूपता के नियम से ΔCAB ~ ΔDEF होगा।

questions.original_question: Eighteen men can complete a work in 14 days. Three women do as much work as two men. Five men and six women started the work and continued for 4 days. Subsequently 3 more men joined the group. In how many total days was the work completed?

english.explanation: Total work = 252 man-days. First 4 days: 9 men-equivalent (5 men + 6 women) = 36 man-days. Remaining work = 216. After 3 more men join, total = 12 men-equivalent. 216/12 = 18 days. Total = 4 + 18 = 22 days.
Unable to solve without the pie chart data. The answer requires calculating x and y from the chart and computing y - 2x.

questions.original_question: Trader A gives a single discount of 25% and Trader B gives two successive discounts of 20% and 5% on an identical item. If the discount given by A is Rs. 320 more than the discount given by B, then what is the marked price (in Rs.) of the item?&nbsp;

english.explanation: Let marked price = M. Trader A’s discount = 0.25M. Trader B’s effective discount = 1 - (0.8*0.95) = 0.24M. Difference: 0.01M = 320 → M = 32000.

questions.original_question:
<p>Points M and N are on the sides PQ and QR respectively of a triangle PQR, right angled at Q. If PN = 9 cm, MR = 7 cm, and MN = 3 cm, then find the length of PR (in cm).</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/01/F1_Arun%20K_20-1-22_Savita_D11.png" style=" width: 222px; height: 212px;" /></p>

english.explanation: Using coordinates and distance formulas, derive equations for PN, MR, MN. Solving gives PR = √(a² + b²) = 11 cm.

hindi.explanation: त्रिभुज PQR में M और N भुजाओं PQ और QR पर बिंदु हैं। PN = 9, MR = 7, MN = 3। लंबाई PR को एकत्र करें: PR = PN + NR = 9 + 4 = 13 सेमी (समकोण त्रिभुज से NR = 4 सेमी)।

questions.original_question: If sin<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;&theta; = 2 sin&nbsp;&theta; - 1, 0&deg;&nbsp;&le;&nbsp;&theta;&nbsp;&le; 90&deg;, then find the value of&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\rm \frac{1 + cosec \theta}{1 - \cos \theta}\)</span>

english.explanation: Solve sin²θ = 2 sinθ -1 → (sinθ -1)²=0 → sinθ=1 → θ=90°. Substituting into [1 + cosecθ]/[1 - cosθ] gives 2.

questions.original_question: Places A and B are 45 km apart from each other. A car starts from place A and another car starts from place B at the same time. If they move in the same direction, they meet in four and a half hours and if they move toward each other, they meet in 27 minutes. What is the speed (in km/h) of the car which moves faster?

english.explanation: Let speeds be v and u. Same direction: v -u = 10. Opposite direction: v +u = 100. Solving gives v = 55 km/h.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate meaning of the given idiom.</strong></p>

<p>Twiddling one&rsquo;s thumbs</p>

english.explanation: The idiom 'twiddling one's thumbs' refers to idling or doing nothing, which is synonymous with feeling bored. The other options (angry, sad, hungry) do not align with the idiom's meaning.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Direction: Select the most appropriate option to substitute the underlined segment in the given sentence. If no substitution is required, select &lsquo;No substitution&rsquo;.</strong></p>

<p>The news <u>are true.</u></p>

english.explanation: The subject 'news' is an uncountable noun and requires a singular verb. 'Are' is incorrect; 'is' (option 4) is the correct verb form.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that can be used as a one-word substitute for the given group of words.</strong></p>

<p>A person who presents a radio/television programme</p>

english.explanation: An 'anchor' is the correct term for someone who hosts a radio/TV program. The other options (comedian, actor, choreographer) do not fit this role.
The logical sequence starts with D (invitation), followed by C (arrival), A (introduction), and B (celebration). DCAB arranges the events chronologically.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate ANTONYM of the given word.</strong></p>

<p>Delight</p>

english.explanation: The antonym of 'delight' (great joy) is 'sorrow' (deep sadness). 'Joy', 'glee', and 'pleasure' are synonyms.

questions.original_question: Select the INCORRECTLY spelt word

english.explanation: 'Neice' is misspelled. The correct spelling is 'niece' (a daughter's daughter). 'Uncle', 'nephew', and 'cousin' are spelled correctly.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Direction: Select the most appropriate option to fill in the blank.</strong></p>

<p>Crowds of tourists ______ across the square all day long.</p>

english.explanation: 'Flowed' best describes the continuous movement of crowds. 'Prodded', 'rectified', and 'maintained' do not fit the context.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Direction: Select the option that expresses the given sentence in reported speech.</strong></p>

<p>He said to me, &quot;It was raining all day.&quot;</p>

options.value: He told me it is raining all day
He told me it was raining all day.
He told me that it had been raining all day.
He told me it has been raining all day.

english.correct_answer: 3. He told me that it had been raining all day.
english.explanation: In reported speech, the past perfect tense ('had been raining') is used to indicate an action completed before another past event. Options 1 and 4 use incorrect tenses.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Direction: Select the option that expresses the given sentence in active voice.</strong></p>

<p>I was given a robot by him.</p>

options.value: A robot by him was given to me
A robot was given to me by him
A robot by him was given to I

english.explanation: Active voice requires the subject (he) to perform the action. Option 1 correctly converts the passive voice to active voice.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Direction: Select the option that will improve the underlined part of the given sentence. In case no improvement is needed select &lsquo;No improvement required&rsquo;.</strong></p>

<p>Bats huddle together to get <u>warm of </u>each other&#39;s bodies.</p>

english.explanation: 'Warmth from' is the correct phrase to describe gaining heat from another source. 'Warm of' is grammatically incorrect.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Direction: Select the most appropriate option to fill in the blank.</strong></p>

<p>It was ______ to everyone present that the patient would not survive if immediate help was not received.</p>

english.explanation: 'Apparent' means clearly visible or obvious, which fits the context. 'Hidden', 'unseen', and 'unnoticed' contradict the intended meaning.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate synonym of the given word.</strong></p>

<p>Cadence</p>

english.explanation: 'Cadence' refers to a rhythmic movement or pattern. 'Rhythm' is the closest synonym. Other options are unrelated.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that can be used as a one-word substitute for the given group of words.</strong></p>

<p>An examination of a dead body to determine the cause of death</p>

english.explanation: A 'post-mortem' is an examination of a dead body to determine the cause of death. The other options are unrelated terms.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate synonym of the given word.</strong></p>

<p>ABSTAIN</p>

english.explanation: 'Abstain' means to deliberately avoid doing something. 'Refrain' is the direct synonym. 'Propose', 'reduce', and 'accept' are unrelated.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate ANTONYM of the given word.</strong></p>

<p>Barbaric</p>

english.explanation: 'Barbaric' means uncivilized or savage. Its antonym is 'civilised' (cultured and refined). 'Brutal', 'inhuman', and 'cruel' are synonyms.

questions.original_question: <strong>Select the INCORRECTLY spelt word.</strong>

english.explanation: The word 'Playright' is incorrectly spelled. The correct spelling is 'Playwright', where the letter 'w' is used instead of 'r'. The other options are correctly spelled as per standard English usage.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Direction: The following sentence has been divided into parts. One of them contains an error. Select the part that contains the error from the given options.</strong></p>

<p>All those students / who are participating / in the play / have been notify / to stay back for rehearsal / after 3:00 p.m.</p>

english.explanation: The phrase 'have been notify' contains a grammatical error. The verb 'notify' should be in its past participle form 'notified' to match the present perfect tense 'have been'. The correct phrase should be 'have been notified'.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Direction: The following sentence has been divided into parts. One of them contains an error. Select the part that contains the error from the given options.</strong></p>

<p>After entering the town, / go straight and then / take a sharpest turn / towards your left / to reach the mall.</p>

english.explanation: The phrase 'take a sharpest turn' is incorrect because the superlative form 'sharpest' should be preceded by the definite article 'the'. The correct phrase is 'take the sharpest turn'. The other options are grammatically correct.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate meaning of the given idiom.</strong></p>

<p>Out of the blue</p>

options.value: Loves to wear only blue colour clothes

english.explanation: The idiom 'Out of the blue' means something that happens suddenly and without prior warning. The other options are incorrect because they either refer to different idioms (e.g., 'beat someone black and blue') or unrelated meanings.

The logical sequence of the dialogue is as follows: The boy first asks for directions (B), then inquires about the distance (D). The shopkeeper responds to the distance (A) and provides the direction (C). This order (BADC) creates a coherent conversation.

questions.original_question: Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 1.

questions.original_question: Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 2

questions.original_question: Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 3.

questions.original_question: Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 4.

english.explanation: 'Specialize' is the correct verb to indicate focusing on a specific area of expertise. The other options do not fit the context of the sentence.

questions.original_question: Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 5.

english.explanation: 'Doubling' refers to the action of increasing something to twice its original amount. The other options do not align with the context of the sentence.
